    position: relative;
    height: 110px;
    width: 105px;
    float: left;
    text-align: center;
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-position: 65% 50%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-2 {
    position: relative;
    float: left;
    width: 345px;
    margin-top: 29px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-2 .cell-2-title {
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    padding-right: 30px;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: Tahoma, Arial;
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-2 .cell-2-message {
    padding-right: 30px;
    font-size: 9.5pt;
    font-family: Tahoma, Arial;
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-3 {
    position: relative;
    width: 450px;
    height: 60px;
    float: left;
    background-color: rgb(240,240,240);
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-3 button {
    position: absolute;
    top: 12px;
    right: 15px;
    width: 110px;
    height: 36px;
}

#en-markup-alert-container .cell-3 button.alt-button {
    position: absolute;
    top: 12px;
    right: 140px;
    width: 110px;
    height: 36px;
}

                            color: #ff5a00;

<div class="article-title ml-3 w-[210px]">
<span>Vintage Watches</span> A 1979 Rolex Day-Date, A 1990s Blancpain Villeret Chronograph, And A 1969 Omega Speedmaster Mark II with 'Racing' Dial
            </div>
</div>
</a>
<a class="feature mb-2 -ml-1" data-segment-content-type="articleLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Latest Articles" data-segment-parent="What's New" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Blancpain Kicks Off 70th Anniversary Celebration With A Limited Edition Fifty Fathoms" data-segment-url="/articles/blancpain-kicks-off-70th-anniversary-celebration-with-a-limited-edition-fifty-fathoms" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/blancpain-kicks-off-70th-anniversary-celebration-with-a-limited-edition-fifty-fathoms">
<div class="flex items-center">
<div class="flex col-start-1 col-end-3">

<div class="article-title ml-3 w-[210px]">

<div class="col-start-1 col-end-2 flex flex-col">
<div class="dropdown-header desktop-label-5 mb-4">Year In Review: </div>

<a class="submenu-link mb-4" data-segment-content-type="textLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Unimatic" data-segment-url="https://shop.hodinkee.com/collections/unimatic-brand" href="https://shop.hodinkee.com/collections/unimatic-brand">
          Unimatic
        </a>
<a class="submenu-link mb-4" data-segment-content-type="textLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Urwerk" data-segment-url="/brands/urwerk" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/brands/urwerk">
          Urwerk
        </a>
<a class="submenu-link mb-4" data-segment-content-type="textLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Vacheron Constantin" data-segment-url="/brands/vacheron-constantin" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/brands/vacheron-constantin">
          Vacheron Constantin
        </a>
<a class="submenu-link mb-4" data-segment-content-type="textLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Van Cleef &amp; Arpels" data-segment-url="/brands/van-cleef-and-arpels" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/brands/van-cleef-and-arpels">
          Van Cleef &amp; Arpels
        </a>
<a class="submenu-link mb-4" data-segment-content-type="textLink" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Zenith" data-segment-url="https://shop.hodinkee.com/collections/zenith-brand" href="https://shop.hodinkee.com/collections/zenith-brand">
          Zenith
        </a>
</div>
</div>
<a class="all-link" data-segment-content-type="textButton" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Brands" data-segment-parent="Brands" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="All Brands" data-segment-url="https://shop.hodinkee.com/pages/brands" href="https://shop.hodinkee.com/pages/brands">
<span class="button-2">ALL BRANDS</span>
<div data-react-class="SvgIcon" data-react-props='{"height":"16","width":"16","className":"h-4 w-4","id":"#right-arrow-icon","alt":"Right Arrow"}'><svg alt="Right Arrow" class="h-4 w-4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><use height="16" width="16" xlink:href="#right-arrow-icon"></use></svg></div>
</a>

<div class="menu-item">
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true" class="expandable-toggle">Insurance</button>
<div class="expandable-menu insurance-submenu" role="menu">
<div class="mt-8 mb-20">
<div class="grid grid-cols-4 gap-x-4">
<div class="col-start-1 col-end-4 flex flex-col w-full">
<div class="dropdown-header desktop-label-5 font-brown font-normal mb-4">Hodinkee INSURANCE</div>
<p class="mobile-headline-5 font-serif font-normal text-inherit mb-4">
        The fastest and most secure way to protect the watches you love.
      </p>
<p class="mobile-body-2 font-serif font-normal text-inherit mb-4">
        We've minimized the paperwork and maximized protection, so you can stop worrying about your watches and focus on enjoying them.
      </p>
<a class="all-link mb-1" data-segment-content-type="textButton" data-segment-header-type="mobile" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Hodinkee INSURANCE" data-segment-parent="Insurance" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Get Started" data-segment-url="https://insurance.hodinkee.com" href="https://insurance.hodinkee.com/">
<div class="button-2">GET STARTED</div>
<div data-react-class="SvgIcon" data-react-props='{"height":"16","width":"16","className":"h-4 w-4","id":"#right-arrow-icon","alt":"Right Arrow"}'><svg alt="Right Arrow" class="h-4 w-4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><use height="16" width="16" xlink:href="#right-arrow-icon"></use></svg></div>
</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-x-4">
<div class="col-start-1 col-end-2 flex flex-col items-center mt-9">
<img class="mb-4 nav-insurance-img" height="48" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-bolt-01579da5.svg" width="48"/>
<div class="mobile-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">INSTANT QUOTES</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
        In most cases, you'll get a personalized quote in seconds and your policy kicks in immediately.
      </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-2 col-end-3 flex flex-col items-center mt-9">
<img class="mb-4 nav-insurance-img" height="48" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-globe-0a41a8ef.svg" width="48"/>
<div class="mobile-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">WORLDWIDE COVERAGE</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
        Wherever you are on planet Earth, your watches are protected. Rest easy and travel safely.
      </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-1 col-end-2 flex flex-col items-center mt-6">
<img class="mb-4 nav-insurance-img" height="48" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-zero-07132b65.svg" width="48"/>
<div class="mobile-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">ZERO DEDUCTIBLE</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
        If you suffer a covered loss, there's no deductible and no gimmicks. Ever.
      </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-2 col-end-3 flex flex-col items-center mt-6">
<img class="mb-4 nav-insurance-img" height="48" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-shield-858781dc.svg" width="48"/>
<div class="mobile-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">INVESTMENT PROTECTION</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
        Each of your watches is covered up to 150% of the insured value (up to the total value of the policy).
      </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<a class="feature -mx-1" data-segment-content-type="featureCard" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Shop Stories" data-segment-parent="Shop" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="An Omega For Everyone" data-segment-url="https://shop.hodinkee.com/blogs/journal/an-omega-for-everyone" href="https://shop.hodinkee.com/blogs/journal/an-omega-for-everyone">

</div>
<div class="nav-feature-title mb-1">An Omega For Everyone</div>
<div class="nav-feature-subtitle">Timeless watchmaking meets modern engineering.</div>
</a>
</div>
<div class="col-start-3 col-end-5 flex flex-col">
<div class="dropdown-header desktop-label-5 mb-4">Featured Collection</div>

<div class="nav-feature-title mb-1">Hidden Gems</div>
<div class="nav-feature-subtitle">Discover our favorite forgotten pre-owned watches.</div>
</a>

<div class="menu-item">
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true" class="expandable-toggle sell-or-trade-submenu">Sell or Trade</button>
<div class="expandable-menu mb-20" role="menu">
<div class="mt-8">
<div aria-label="Sell or Trade" class="flex flex-col mr-20" role="menu">
<p class="desktop-label-5 text-gray-60 py-1 mb-3" role="presentation">
      SELL OR TRADE
    </p>
<div class="headline-5 font-serif font-normal text-gray-95 mb-4">It's time to get what you really want</div>
<p class="body-2 font-serif font-normal text-gray-95 mb-5">
      Our quotes are based on historical sales and real-time market data allowing us to give fair prices without all the
      hassle.
    </p>
<div class="flex mt-1">
<a class="all-link" data-segment-content-type="textButton" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Sell or trade" data-segment-parent="Sell or Trade" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="LEARN MORE" data-segment-url="https://shop.hodinkee.com/pages/sell-or-trade" href="https://shop.hodinkee.com/pages/sell-or-trade">

<div class="article-title article-title-desktop pl-3 leading-[1.3] w-[210px]">
<span>A Week On The Wrist</span> Giving Some Long-Overdue Love To The Cartier Ballon Bleu

<div class="grid grid-cols-12 gap-x-5">
<div class="grid grid-cols-4 gap-x-5 col-start-1 col-end-5 h-min">
<div class="col-start-1 col-end-5">
<div class="dropdown-header desktop-label-5 mb-4">POPULAR COLUMNS</div>
</div>
<div class="flex flex-col col-start-1 col-end-3">

<div class="nav-tab insurance" role="menuitem">
<div>
<div aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true" class="nav-link" data-submenu="#insurance-submenu">
<a class="nav-tab-link" data-segment-content-type="navItem" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Insurance" data-segment-url="https://insurance.hodinkee.com" href="https://insurance.hodinkee.com/" role="link">
            Insurance
          </a>
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true" aria-label="Insurance" class="nav-tab-caret" role="button">
<svg class="h-4 w-4 stroke-current fill-current">
<use xlink:href="#icon-show-more-arrow" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></use>
</svg>
</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-menu absolute top-full inset-x-0 pt-0 px-0 w-full transition-all ease-in-out duration-75 invisible">
<div aria-hidden="true" class="submenu nav-dropdown" id="insurance-submenu" role="menu">
<div class="nav-dropdown-content flex max-w-[1280px] mx-auto">
<div class="grid grid-rows-1 grid-cols-12 gap-2.5">
<div class="flex flex-col col-start-1 col-end-4">
<div class="dropdown-header desktop-label-5 font-brown font-normal mb-4">Hodinkee INSURANCE</div>
<p class="desktop-headline-5 font-serif font-normal text-inherit mb-4">
          The fastest and most secure way to protect the watches you love.
        </p>
<p class="desktop-body-2 font-serif font-normal text-inherit mb-5">
          We've minimized the paperwork and maximized protection, so you can stop worrying about your watches and focus on enjoying them.
        </p>
<a class="all-link" data-segment-content-type="textButton" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="navigation-clicked" data-segment-list-heading="Hodinkee INSURANCE" data-segment-parent="Insurance" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="Get Started" data-segment-url="https://insurance.hodinkee.com" href="https://insurance.hodinkee.com/">
<div class="button-2">GET STARTED</div>
<div data-react-class="SvgIcon" data-react-props='{"height":"16","width":"16","className":"h-4 w-4","id":"#right-arrow-icon","alt":"Right Arrow"}'><svg alt="Right Arrow" class="h-4 w-4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><use height="16" width="16" xlink:href="#right-arrow-icon"></use></svg></div>
</a>
</div>
<div class="grid grid-cols-4 gap-5 col-start-5 col-end-13">
<div class="col-start-1 col-end-2 flex flex-col items-center mt-14">
<img alt="Lightning Bolt" class="mb-6 nav-insurance-img" height="80" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-bolt-01579da5.svg" width="80"/>
<div class="desktop-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">INSTANT QUOTES</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
            In most cases, you'll get a personalized quote in seconds and your policy kicks in immediately.
          </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-2 col-end-3 flex flex-col items-center mt-14">
<img alt="Globe" class="mb-6 nav-insurance-img" height="80" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-globe-0a41a8ef.svg" width="80"/>
<div class="desktop-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">WORLDWIDE COVERAGE</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
            Wherever you are on planet Earth, your watches are protected. Rest easy and travel safely.
          </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-3 col-end-4 flex flex-col items-center mt-14">
<img alt="Zero" class="mb-6 nav-insurance-img" height="80" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-zero-07132b65.svg" width="80"/>
<div class="desktop-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">ZERO DEDUCTIBLE</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
            If you suffer a covered loss, there's no deductible and no gimmicks. Ever.
          </p>
</div>
<div class="col-start-4 col-end-5 flex flex-col items-center mt-14">
<img alt="Shield" class="mb-6 nav-insurance-img" height="80" loading="lazy" src="./Hodinkee_files/nav-insurance-shield-858781dc.svg" width="80"/>
<div class="desktop-label-4 font-brown font-normal text-inherit text-center mb-2">INVESTMENT PROTECTION</div>
<p class="font-serif font-normal text-sm text-inherit text-center leading-[1.3]">
            Each of your watches is covered up to 150% of the insured value (up to the total value of the policy).
          </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

      </a>

<div class="nav-dropdown-content flex max-w-[1280px] mx-auto">
<div class="grid grid-rows-1 grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-x-5 mx-1 lg:mx-0" id="nav-sell-or-trade">
<div aria-label="Sell or Trade" class="flex flex-col col-start-1 col-end-3 lg:col-start-1 lg:col-end-4 mr-20 lg:mr-0" role="menu">
<p class="desktop-label-5 text-gray-60 py-1 mb-3" role="presentation">
          SELL OR TRADE
        </p>
<div class="headline-5 font-serif font-normal text-gray-95 mb-4">It's time to get what you really want</div>
<p class="body-2 font-serif font-normal text-gray-95 mb-5">
          Our quotes are based on historical sales and real-time market data allowing us to give fair prices without all
          the hassle.
        </p>
<div class="flex mt-1">

</a> </li>
<li class="flex-shrink-0 first:ml-4 lg:first:ml-0 last:pr-4 lg:last:pr-0">

3600w"/>
</div>
<div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>A Week On The Wrist</span> Giving Some Long-Overdue Love To The Cartier Ballon Bleu
              </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a>
<div class="article-sub-info">
<h4 class="article-lede"><p>Sure, Cartier designers are known for more angular watches like the Tank and Santos, but could their more daring option be a <i>traditional</i> round watch?</p></h4>
<p class="article-meta">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Brandon menancio" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/527">
<span class="by">By</span>
                      Brandon Menancio
</a> </span>
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="articles-container">
<div class="articles-scroller">
<div class="article">
<a class="article-link" data-index="1" data-segment-content-section="Top Six" data-segment-content-type="articleCard" data-segment-header-type="web" data-segment-link-clicked="article-clicked" data-segment-site="Editorial" data-segment-title="MB&amp;F Just Made The World’s Most Ambitious Watches For Women" data-segment-url="/articles/mbandf-just-made-the-worlds-most-ambitious-watches-for-women" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/mbandf-just-made-the-worlds-most-ambitious-watches-for-women" target="_self">
<div class="article-hero-link">
<div class="RatioContainer bg-gray-5" style="padding-bottom: 48%">
<img alt="MB&amp;F Flying T x Emmanuel Tarpin Watches " class="lazyloaded" data-sizes="(min-width: 1024px) 389px, (min-width: 768px) 303px, 232px" data-src="https://hodinkee-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/images/05ea2f8f-246d-4f4a-9e5c-6ae4ce778bf4/mbf10-21-2022013116by9.jpg" 696w, https://hodinkee.imgix.net/uploads/images/05ea2f8f-246d-4f4a-9e5c-6ae4ce778bf4/mbf10-21-2022013116by9.jpg?ixlib=rails-1.1.0&amp;fm=jpg&amp;q=55&amp;auto=format&amp;usm=12&amp;fit=crop&amp;ch=Width%2CDPR%2CSave-Data&amp;alt=&amp;ar=25%3A12&amp;w=778 778w, <div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>In-Depth</span> MB&amp;F Just Made The World’s Most Ambitious Watches For Women
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Malaika crawford" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/552">
<span class="by">By</span>
                Malaika Crawford
</a> </span>
</p>

<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>Introducing</span> Blancpain Kicks Off 70th Anniversary Celebration With A Limited Edition Fifty Fathoms
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Anthony traina" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/428">
<span class="by">By</span>
                Anthony Traina
</a> </span>
</p>

<div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>Hands-On</span> A Mechanical Watch Fanatic Reviews The Apple Watch Ultra 
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Logan baker" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/115">
<span class="by">By</span>
                Logan Baker
</a> </span>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>Vintage Watches</span> A 1979 Rolex Day-Date, A 1990s Blancpain Villeret Chronograph, And A 1969 Omega Speedmaster Mark II with 'Racing' Dial
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Hodinkee shop" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/69">
<span class="by">By</span>
                HODINKEE Shop
</a> </span>
</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>Four + One</span> A Champion Of Inclusivity Shares His Collection
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Nora taylor" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/296">
<span class="by">By</span>
                Nora Taylor
</a> </span>
</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="article">

</div>
<div class="article-info">
<h3 class="article-title" role="link">
<span>Watch Of The Week</span> My Casio Combines Two Of My Biggest Loves – Film And Family
      </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a> <div class="article-sub-info">
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
</span>
</p>
<p class="article-meta mt-2">
<span>
<a aria-label="By Keitravis squire" class="byline-author-link" href="https://www.hodinkee.com/pages/editor/614">
<span class="by">By</span>
                Keitravis Squire
</a> </span>

<p class="article-title"><a href="https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/pre-owned-picks-what-is-new-and-interesting-in-the-hodinkee-shop"><span>Pre-Owned Picks</span> What Is New And Interesting In The Hodinkee Shop</a></p>
<p class="article-info">
<span class="by">By</span> Mark hackman
            </p>
</div>
<div class="article">
<a href="https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/pre-owned-wrists-come-in-all-sizes-and-watches-do-too">
<img class="lazyload" data-sizes="224px" data-src="https://hodinkee-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/images/66d217ea-8e19-4f47-af20-c75a6961535a/Zenith-Chronomaster-El-Primero-03-Z386-400-10-10-ZEN-0TV6X9-35e23cf561cf_2048x2048.jpg" data-srcset="https://hodinkee.imgix.net/uploads/images/66d217ea-8e19-4f47-af20-c75a6961535a/Zenith-Chronomaster-El-Primero-03-Z386-400-10-10-ZEN-0TV6X9-35e23cf561cf_2048x2048.jpg?ixlib=rails-1.1.0&amp;fm=jpg&amp;q=55&amp;auto=format&amp;usm=12&amp;fit=crop&amp;ch=Width%2CDPR%2CSave-Data&amp;alt=&amp;ar=16%3A9&amp;w=224 224w, https://hodinkee.imgix.net/uploads/images/66d217ea-8e19-4f47-af20-c75a6961535a/Zenith-Chronomaster-El-Primero-03-Z386-400-10-10-ZEN-0TV6X9-35e23cf561cf_2048x2048.jpg?ixlib=rails-1.1.0&amp;fm=jpg&amp;q=55&amp;auto=format&amp;usm=12&amp;fit=crop&amp;ch=Width%2CDPR%2CSave-Data&amp;alt=&amp;ar=16%3A9&amp;w=448 448w, https://hodinkee.imgix.net/uploads/images/66d217ea-8e19-4f47-af20-c75a6961535a/Zenith-Chronomaster-El-Primero-03-Z386-400-10-10-ZEN-0TV6X9-35e23cf561cf_2048x2048.jpg?ixlib=rails-1.1.0&amp;fm=jpg&amp;q=55&amp;auto=format&amp;usm=12&amp;fit=crop&amp;ch=Width%2CDPR%2CSave-Data&amp;alt=&amp;ar=16%3A9&amp;w=672 672w"/>
</a>
<p class="article-title"><a href="https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/pre-owned-wrists-come-in-all-sizes-and-watches-do-too"><span>Pre-Owned Picks</span> Wrists Come In All Sizes, And Watches Do Too</a></p>
<p class="article-info">
<span class="by">By</span> Mark hackman
            </p>
</div>

<p class="footer-light-title">Enter the World of Hodinkee</p>
<p class="desktop-body-2 italic text-gray-20 mb-[5.5rem] md:w-[389px] lg:w-auto xl:mb-0">All the watches you need to know about, delivered to your inbox daily.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
  var analytics = window.analytics = window.analytics || [];
  if (analytics.initialize) return;
  if (analytics.invoked) {
    if (window.console && console.error) {
      console.error('Segment snippet included twice.');
    }
    return;
  }
  analytics.invoked = true;
  analytics.methods = ['identify', 'page', 'track'];
  analytics.factory = function (method) {
    return function () {
      var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
      args.unshift(method);
      analytics.push(args);
      return analytics;
    };
  };
  for (var i = 0; i < analytics.methods.length; i++) {
    var key = analytics.methods[i];
    analytics[key] = analytics.factory(key);
  }
  analytics.load = function (key, options) {
    var script = document.createElement('script');
    script.type = 'text/javascript';
    script.async = true;
    script.src = 'https://cdn.segment.com/analytics.js/v1/'
      + key + '/analytics.min.js';
    var first = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    first.parentNode.insertBefore(script, first);
    analytics._loadOptions = options;
  };
  analytics.SNIPPET_VERSION = '4.13.2';
  analytics._writeKey = "7QAQ7kxo3DDkAeQTOoMKfCKblrlGC5XB"
  analytics.load("7QAQ7kxo3DDkAeQTOoMKfCKblrlGC5XB");
})();
</script>

<div id="onetrust-consent-sdk"><div class="onetrust-pc-dark-filter ot-hide ot-fade-in"></div><div aria-label="Privacy Preference Center" aria-modal="true" class="ot-sdk-container otPcCenter ot-hide ot-fade-in ot-accordions-pc" id="onetrust-pc-sdk" lang="en" role="alertdialog"><!-- Close Button --> <button aria-label="Close" class="main pc-close-button ot-close-icon" id="close-pc-btn-handler"></button><!-- Close Button --><div class="ot-main-content" id="ot-content"><!-- Logo Tag --><div class="pc-logo-container"><div aria-label="Company Logo" class="pc-logo" role="img" style='background-image: url("https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/d463d7b4-eb1c-4537-9b37-79f9e17acb97/41e0c9de-8b11-48c8-b9b4-22a26586339b/a85f9447-61dc-4cd9-bce6-c0d2897694cf/cc-full-logo.png");
                    background-position: left;'></div></div><h2 id="pc-title">Privacy Preference Center</h2><div id="pc-policy-text">When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
                <br/><a aria-label="More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab" class="privacy-notice-link" href="https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies" rel="noopener" target="_blank">More information</a></div><div class="ot-sdk-row" id="accept-recommended-container"><div class="ot-sdk-column"><button class="button-theme" id="accept-recommended-btn-handler">Allow All</button></div></div><section class="ot-sdk-row category-group" id="cookie-preferences"><h3 id="manage-cookies-text"> Manage Consent Preferences</h3><div class="accordion-text category-item" data-optanongroupid="C0004"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="category-header" id="ot-header-id-C0004">Targeting Cookies</h4><!-- Group toggle --><div class="ot-switch ot-toggle"><input aria-checked="true" aria-controls="ot-desc-id-C0004" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0004" checked="" class="switch-checkbox category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0004" id="ot-group-id-C0004" name="ot-group-id-C0004" role="switch" type="checkbox"/> <label class="ot-switch-label" for="ot-group-id-C0004"><span class="ot-switch-inner"></span> <span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="label-text">Targeting Cookies</span></label></div><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-C0004">These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.</p><!-- sub groups --><!-- view vendors link --><!-- View host link --></div><div class="accordion-text category-item" data-optanongroupid="C0003"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="category-header" id="ot-header-id-C0003">Functional Cookies</h4><!-- Group toggle --><div class="ot-switch ot-toggle"><input aria-checked="true" aria-controls="ot-desc-id-C0003" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003" checked="" class="switch-checkbox category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" name="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" type="checkbox"/> <label class="ot-switch-label" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-inner"></span> <span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="label-text">Functional Cookies</span></label></div><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-C0003">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.</p><!-- sub groups --><!-- view vendors link --><!-- View host link --></div><div class="accordion-text category-item" data-optanongroupid="C0002"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="category-header" id="ot-header-id-C0002">Performance Cookies</h4><!-- Group toggle --><div class="ot-switch ot-toggle"><input aria-checked="true" aria-controls="ot-desc-id-C0002" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002" checked="" class="switch-checkbox category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" name="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" type="checkbox"/> <label class="ot-switch-label" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-inner"></span> <span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="label-text">Performance Cookies</span></label></div><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-C0002">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.</p><!-- sub groups --><!-- view vendors link --><!-- View host link --></div><div class="accordion-text category-item ot-always-active-group" data-optanongroupid="C0001"><!-- Group name --><h4 class="category-header" id="ot-header-id-C0001">Strictly Necessary Cookies</h4><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div><!-- Group toggle --><div class="ot-switch ot-toggle ot-hide-tgl"><input aria-checked="true" aria-controls="ot-desc-id-C0001" aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0001" checked="" class="switch-checkbox category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0001" id="ot-group-id-C0001" name="ot-group-id-C0001" role="switch" type="checkbox"/> <label class="ot-switch-label" for="ot-group-id-C0001"><span class="ot-switch-inner"></span> <span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="label-text">Strictly Necessary Cookies</span></label></div><!-- Group description --><p class="ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-C0001">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.</p><!-- sub groups --><!-- view vendors link --><!-- View host link --></div><!-- Groups sections starts --><!-- Group section ends --><!-- Accordion Group section starts --><!-- Accordion Group section ends --><!-- Footer section starts --><div class="save-preference-btn-container"> <button class="save-preference-btn-handler onetrust-close-btn-handler button-theme">Confirm My Choices</button><div class="ot-pc-footer-logo"><a aria-label="Powered by OneTrust Opens in a new Tab" class="powered-by-logo" href="https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/" rel="noopener noreferrer" style='background-image: url("https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/poweredBy_ot_logo.svg");' target="_blank"></a></div></div><!-- Footer section ends --></section></div><section class="ot-hide hosts-list" id="vendors-list"><div id="vendors-list-header"><button aria-label="Back" class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler"><svg id="ot-back-arrow" viewbox="0 0 444.531 444.531" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px"><title>Back Button</title><g><path d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835
                      l-21.409-21.416C323.432,3.521,314.817,0,304.637,0s-18.791,3.521-25.841,10.561L92.649,196.425
                      c-7.044,7.043-10.566,15.656-10.566,25.841s3.521,18.791,10.566,25.837l186.146,185.864c7.05,7.043,15.66,10.564,25.841,10.564
                      s18.795-3.521,25.834-10.564l21.409-21.412c7.05-7.039,10.567-15.604,10.567-25.697c0-10.085-3.518-18.746-10.567-25.978
                      L213.13,222.409z" fill="#656565"></path></g></svg><p class="pc-back-button-text">Back</p></button><!-- Close Button --> <button aria-label="Close" class="vendors-list pc-close-button ot-close-icon" id="vendor-close-pc-btn-handler"></button><!-- Close Button --><h3 id="vendors-list-title">Performance Cookies</h3><div id="search-container"><p class="screen-reader-only" role="status"></p><label class="screen-reader-only" for="vendor-search-handler">Vendor Search</label> <input id="vendor-search-handler" name="vendor-search-handler" placeholder="Search..." type="text"/> <svg height="30" viewbox="0 -30 110 110" width="30" x="0px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px"><title>Search Icon</title><path d="M55.146,51.887L41.588,37.786c3.486-4.144,5.396-9.358,5.396-14.786c0-12.682-10.318-23-23-23s-23,10.318-23,23
